\chapter{Airogrammes}

USED TO USA 11-10-52 (FF685) }

\ph[width=.80\textwidth]{../kuwait/airogramme-02.jpg}{Message inside signed by the Kuwait 
postmaster dated 14-9-52 advising that imprinted aerogrammes have been sold out for a 
month but he expects a new supply shortly. }
